text: Mokhtar Hasni (19 March 1952 – 21 January 2024) was a Tunisian football forward. He played for the Tunisia national team in the 1978 FIFA World Cup.1978 FIFA World Cup Argentina Hasni died on 21 January 2024, at the age of 71.L’ancien joueur de la RAAL, international tunisien et commerçant louviérois bien connu Moktar Hasni est décédé ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Tunisian footballers
title: Mokhtar Hasni
